website_summaries.verdict: A good starting point for a throwing axe with lots of surface for catching your target.
pros: Made from a durable stainless steel
Also comes in green and orange
cons: Treat these with caution, they are very sharp and are not a toy

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this as a funny Christmas gift for my husband who loves the Walking ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a funny Christmas gift for my husband who loves the Walking Dead. He is constantly reciting Rick on the phrase "I'm going to kill you with the red handled hatchet." Although, this was just purchased as more of a gag gift, it is super sharp. My husband and I were both impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: YES SIR!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift. Now I want (at least) one for myself. It is lightweight and comfortable to hold. The paracord wrap is a definite bonus. Do I think the Zombies are coming?..No. However, the factory edge is sharp enough to shave with and if the blade will hold an edge this will make a great addition to the pickup truck, the tackle box, or the camping/hunting/fishing gear. Easily could be secured to a backpack or vest. I would not recommend this for anyone who might look at this as a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Young

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simple throwing axe
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple throwing axe. Decently sharp and very light weight. My only complaint is the handle wrapping. If only this throwing axe would've came with a quality handle, it would be an improvement. Other than the handle, its still a really cool weapon. For the price, I'd say its a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Broke!
customer_reviews.text: Cool look but not very functional as a throwing axe. Chord was shredded by other axes. Blade broke off in first day of use. (Was thrown at a block of wood). VERY difficult to stick it to target. Might be good for other uses, but not recommended for targets.
customer_reviews.author: e shifko

customer_reviews.title: These are just fun.
customer_reviews.text: We set up a corregated plastic board wall in the basement and the grandkids (and I) love throwing these. Easy to throw, easy to stick and look cool. Also use tomahawks and knives but these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F Harley

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. I have large hands and it fits my hands really well and comfortably. I teach martial arts and I am skilled with my Butterfly Sword, but I wanted a more practical, 21st century weapon that could be used in close quarters. They turned out to be perfect for what I envisioned and the weight is perfect. Be warned and handle with caution and respect because THEY ARE VERY SHARP!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Eric Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blade, Bad Handle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as fun throwing axes for my step-son. The blades are serious. You could definitely put an eye out. They are weighted well and have turned out to be super-fun for throwing. My only complaint is that the cord handles almost immediately fell off. I think the sharp metal side of the handles shred the cord. I'm thinking of getting some leather strips to re-wrap the handles, for a little hand protection, which would be way cooler on zombie killing axes, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend's sister loved it, throws axes, said it was smooth and light
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying something else.
customer_reviews.text: The tip was elongated and curved definitely not a point. The string on the Handle wasn't wrapped well and was coming off out of the box. The black coating was inconsistent at best. I didn't expect much but a little better quality control would have been nice
customer_reviews.author: EmandTj

customer_reviews.title: Just a decoration item.
customer_reviews.text: The looks of the product are cool and that’s the reason for the one star. Other than that, it’s quite useless as it does not serve the purpose of a throwing axe.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 would be better
customer_reviews.text: It was extremly sharp out of the box, expecially the tip. Cut my hand the first day wth the cover on. It is easy to throw and master it after an hour it what easy to hit cans at 25 feet. It tumbles far so make shot it has plenty of room behind it. The tip bends easy and on my 6th session throwing it broke off but it was still money well spent
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with the product is it was damaged. The tip was bent and the point was gone. Easy to repair the suppler needs better packaging
customer_reviews.author: clinton petit

customer_reviews.title: awesome gift idea
customer_reviews.text: The skullsplitter was a gift for someone and the gift was happily received. It is sharp and scary looking at having the words "zombie killer" on the side just adds to the fun. The price is unbeatable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice for the price. It was a gift so I didn't use it. It was nice and sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: Jered

customer_reviews.title: Take down those zombies!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, like some of the other reviewers, and just like them, I now want to get one (or two, or three or four, so on etc etc) for myself. It is comfortable to hold and wield. It's sharp right out of the package. It's well balanced. This throwing axe is no joke. Since zombies are attracted to loud noise, shooting them may not always be a wise idea. You may have to go the stealthy route and this certainly will be helpful. The legions of dead should beware! With the Zombie Killer Skullsplitter Throwing Axes out there, they will not be dominating the Earth!
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome nicely sharpened and fits great in my hand
customer_reviews.author: Auto-Troll

customer_reviews.title: Handle thin, blade sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sharp. The handle is a little thin which I know I should have expected, but that is all that's holding it back from 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This also was for my son and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: annieu

customer_reviews.title: Superb!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift as well and Im also considering one for myself. Love the sharpness and the holster is perfect. the fact that its lightweight is a plus. great for camping!
customer_reviews.author: sheska

customer_reviews.title: Decent for what i paid
customer_reviews.text: Broke I purchased on April 11. Had to re wrap handle shortly after I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Sillavan

customer_reviews.title: balance is good and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: My son has only gotten to take this out for target practice once so far, but it worked well, balance is good and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color but still awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was everything I hoped it would be, but I ordered a red one. I ended up with a orange one. Other than that perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I threw at a soft target about 6 times. The tip broke off the edge. I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: he LOVED it. It's more than what I was expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday because he's really into knives and swords, he LOVED it. It's more than what I was expecting to get. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cramer

customer_reviews.title: redid red rope with grip tape like on skate boards made it safe
customer_reviews.text: redid red rope with grip tape like on skate boards made it safe, but overall good rope comes off when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, not anything super durable but for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, not anything super durable but for the price I would have to say it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: noah

customer_reviews.title: He had been asking for a throwing tomahawk as he had learned he is quite good with them in bible school over the summer
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift I purchased for my son for his 13th birthday. He had been asking for a throwing tomahawk as he had learned he is quite good with them in bible school over the summer. He LOVES it! He calls it Bae and loves to sharpen it. Not sorry I got this for him one bit. Cannot wait to take him to the mountains so he can really try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value here. Very well-constructed can't believe it's price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. I'm not all to King the zombie killer logo but I need it hides a Quality Steel Precision crafted throwing axe. I ordered one just to make sure it was quality and I'm about to order 10 more. If you're not sure weather in lot to get this go ahead and get it it's fun. And it's a great value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrive ahead of time even. Very sturdy, and sharp. Nice design and colors. The only thing that could have made it better is that it's a little small, maybe make them a tad bigger?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was beaten up
customer_reviews.text: Product was not sharpened, both boxes where beaten up, the grip is flimsy, top and bottom tips were bent in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best axe ever
customer_reviews.text: Me and my brother were hunting and I threw it at a rabbit and it pierced it no problem
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

product_meta.title: Armory Replicas Zombie Killer Skullsplitter Throwing Axe - Red
product_meta.description: One of three awesome colors, buy all three together to complete the set! Razor sharp and forged from a solid slab of black coated stainless steel with a heavy sawback design, this wicked throwing axe will always hit the mark from distance when aimed at a fearsome zombie (or one of our great target boards if you prefer). Aside from adding a distinctive dash of vibrant color, the red nylon- cord wrapped handle provides a strong and secure grip and along with a large finger hole aids in throwing accuracy. Comes with a FREE nylon snap fastened sheath as well as a carrying loop.
feature_bullets: Head Material: Stainless Steel, Powder coated black finish, Silver lining
